actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deduction for moving expenses shall apply without regard to dollar limitations in the case of Federal employees other than Members of Congress and their staffs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the deduction for moving expenses shall apply without regard to dollar limitations in the case of Federal employees other than Members of Congress and their staffs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deduction for moving expenses shall apply without regard to dollar limitations in the case of Federal employees other than Members of Congress and their staffs.
